I bought one of these bras and loved it so much, I bought 2 more!  They are so comfortable, they fit great (I bought a Large) and are perfect for yoga, walking, or just wearing as a daily bra (I don't wear regular bras anymore--I'm 59 and way too old for those uncomfortable things!)  They look great under sweaters peeking through or under tanks in the summer, or just with leggings for yoga or moderate exercise (as pictured). They don't pinch--no back fat bulging over.  These don't have a lot of support, but I'm small busted so I don't need a lot of support. Larger boobs may need more support if you are looking for a sports bra; but if you are looking for a great all around bra, this is what you want.  I wish there were more colors and prints, I would totally buy them all.  I highly recommend.
This was received without a tag and I don’t see a size on it anywhere. These are gifts so sizing and tag is important!!
Great quality and comfy

I purchased this bra because I was looking for undergarments that did not have a wire. I would classify this as medium support, but since I have small breasts, it works for a high impact workout. It is also comfortable enough to wear as an every day undergarment. I wish it snapped in the back instead of a pullover bra but other than that, it fits great and it is seamless so it can be worn under tight fitting tops . I would recommend. I wear a 34B and I ordered a size small .
Quality is nice but the ribcage was a couple inches too wide.

评论概述: Lots of colors to choose from
评论详情: Let me start by saying that I love CRZ Yoga Shorts and their Leggings. The butterluxe is all I wear in shorts and leggings. I have found that the tops that are made like this with the thins straps don't off enough coverage for my 36DDs. It seems that when doing forward bends, they want to spill out the top a little and sometimes a little out the side if you are using your arms a lot while laying on your back. It is not bad, but I find it annoying. That being said, the material is wonderful... very soft. It is thick, but not too thick and it always washes and drys beautifully. I wash them in the machine on regular and pop them in the dryer with no issues whatsoever. They also have lots of different styles and great colors to choose from. If you are smaller in the chest, give them a shot!

This is probably one of the highest quality dupes if you know what I mean. Fits great and easy  to take off. I usually struggle to get it over my shoulders, but now I can pull it down over my hips. Love the colors too
Probably the most comfortable bras I own. Love that you can remove the pads and adjust the straps. They’re pretty supportive too. A little expensive but very comfortable.
I have a few of the CRZ YOGA tank tops and I'm a fan.  I order the same size (med) for this bra and it barely covers.  Runs very small.  Maybe order 2 sizes up?

I am 5’5… 145lbs and wear a C cup and no joke this sports bra is my new favorite!! I am very athletic so I have way too many sports bras than I would like to admit lol. But no joke this sports bra beats all the others I have. It has adjustable straps which I can not stress enough about because it will fits me like a glove. This sports bra is true to size I would say. And the stability is amazing. 10/10 worth your money.
For great and secured boobs this is great
Got this for my girl and she says the cups are a tad small inside the bra
My daughter loves this top & wears it to dance
Bought this in black and it’s so comfortable!!!!! I got a small and I’m a d. They always seem to fit me well. I’m also 110 pounds Will def repurchase!

Already ordered this in black but this time, I got a med. I feel like the small was a teeny snug bit not enough for me to rate it a 4 versus a 5. The small, since it’s a little snug and it’s low cut gives nice cleavage. 🎉

The cups In these sports bras are really what does it for me. They make the goodies look magnificent. The bra itself also does a wonderful job of keeping everything locked in. As a petite lady, I also love the adjustable straps. Most sports bras are too long for my torso and don’t give me the support I need so this is amazing.
Material is perfect and so comfortable. Great dupe with such good quality

I’m a 34B 120 pounds and 5’7. I’m typically a size small but I had to size down to an XS because the band was too large around my chest. If you like the extra width, I’d say it’s TTS but I like tight sports bras and now it’s perfect. I want to buy one in every color!
Super comfy, cute, and soft. Im a 34 B and size S fit perfectly

I loved this bra. The quality of it is sooo amazing! They really are buttersoft omg would definitely recommend these 10/10
Perfect sports and yoga bra. Soft and comfortable with good support.
